Text:
A fabulous up ! it's Apana sen's first direction.it was rumored, that film was made by Satyajit Roy by d help of Aparna Sen's assistance !

But time went on n we d general people know it is only rumored without d truth !

So, credit goes to Aparna Sen for direction &  malikjee fo up ! many thnx..
thanks a lot sirjee...world cup ki jeet ki bahut bahut bhadai
we are the world champs now...thank you team india..and thank you malikjee sir for we have these fabulous films to see and enjoy..
Thank you for this wonderful movie! I really enjoy your uploads! :)

please seed so more people can enjoy it
i'm not indian but i absolutely love the culture :)
